definition[0]_en: A generation that is derived from the master.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A generation that is derived from the master.
scope note[0]_en: This term applies to digital resources.

definition[0]_en: A generation that is a negative metal copy of a recording cut typically onto a lacquer-coated disc by means of a disc lathe; the lacquer original is destroyed in the process.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A generation that is a negative metal copy of a recording cut typically onto a lacquer-coated disc by means of a disc lathe; the lacquer original is destroyed in the process.
scope note[0]_en: This term applies to audio resources.

definition[0]_en: A generation that is a reproduction, usually with negative polarity, of the original picture or sound track, where a duplicate negative is made from a master positive, which in turn was made from an earlier negative. (Deprecated)
ToolkitDefinition_en: A generation that is a reproduction, usually with negative polarity, of the original picture or sound track, where a duplicate negative is made from a master positive, which in turn was made from an earlier negative. (Deprecated)
scope note[0]_en: This term applies to motion picture resources. (Deprecated)

definition[0]_en: A generation that is the original camera film or videotape used to record the production.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A generation that is the original camera film or videotape used to record the production.
scope note[0]_en: This term applies to microform and video resources.

definition[0]_en: A generation that is created from the process of digitization at the highest resolution and often used to make derivative copies.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A generation that is created from the process of digitization at the highest resolution and often used to make derivative copies.
scope note[0]_en: This term applies to digital resources.

definition[0]_en: A generation that is the original recorded version of a tape from which copies can be made.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A generation that is the original recorded version of a tape from which copies can be made.
scope note[0]_en: This term applies to audio resources.

definition[0]_en: A generation that is a combination of generations for which it is not possible to assign more precise terms.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A generation that is a combination of generations for which it is not possible to assign more precise terms.

definition[0]_en: A generation that is a positive metal copy of a disc master used to create one or more stampers.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A generation that is a positive metal copy of a disc master used to create one or more stampers.
scope note[0]_en: This term applies to audio resources.

definition[0]_en: A generation that is the first of a resource created digitally.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A generation that is the first of a resource created digitally.
scope note[0]_en: This term applies to digital resources.

definition[0]_en: A generation that is used to produce subsequent generations of microforms.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A generation that is used to produce subsequent generations of microforms.

definition[0]_en: A generation that is a release print approved by the producer and director of a film.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A generation that is a release print approved by the producer and director of a film.
scope note[0]_en: This term applies to motion picture resources.

definition[0]_en: A generation that is a positive print made from an earlier generation negative film and used for the preparation of duplicate negatives rather than projection.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A generation that is a positive print made from an earlier generation negative film and used for the preparation of duplicate negatives rather than projection.
scope note[0]_en: This term applies to motion picture resources.

definition[0]_en: A generation that is a negative film originally exposed in a camera and thus of better quality than any subsequent generation or derivative.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A generation that is a negative film originally exposed in a camera and thus of better quality than any subsequent generation or derivative.
scope note[0]_en: This term applies to motion picture resources.

definition[0]_en: A generation that is intended primarily for use.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A generation that is intended primarily for use.

definition[0]_en: A generation that is a hard metal negative copy of a disc master that can be mounted within a press and used to impress the groove pattern in a production run of discs.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A generation that is a hard metal negative copy of a disc master that can be mounted within a press and used to impress the groove pattern in a production run of discs.
scope note[0]_en: This term applies to audio resources.

definition[0]_en: A generation that is a tape copy, usually a first generation copy of the master, used for creating multiple copies of the content.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A generation that is a tape copy, usually a first generation copy of the master, used for creating multiple copies of the content.
scope note[0]_en: This term applies to audio resources.

definition[0]_en: A generation that is one of a short run of pressings used to check for any flaws before running a full pressing.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A generation that is one of a short run of pressings used to check for any flaws before running a full pressing.
scope note[0]_en: This term applies to audio resources. Initial pressings sent out to reviewers, DJs, etc., are excluded.

definition[0]_en: A generation that is a copy that may be viewed by researchers.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A generation that is a copy that may be viewed by researchers.
scope note[0]_en: This term applies to motion picture resources.

definition[0]_en: A generation that is a negative film made from a master positive or other positive film or from an original negative, used to make positive prints.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A generation that is a negative film made from a master positive or other positive film or from an original negative, used to make positive prints.
scope note[0]_en: This term applies to motion picture resources.
